name: Solomon Fadun - Risk Management of Everything
profile:
Welcome to 'Risk Management of Everything' Channel.

My name is Dr Solomon Fadun, a risk management expert. I am passionate about enlightening people about risk management to enhance wealth and improvement the management of resources. 

Our goal is to create and post videos on the risk management of everything. On this channel, you will find videos on risk management and its application in different areas and sectors. 

If you are new here, make sure to SUBSCRIBE to our channel to get the latest weekly videos on risk management.

Thank you.
